includedAssets.title: Episode #2.1
includedAssets.synopsis: Saga and Martin are reunited to investigate the case of five youths found chained up on an abandoned ship.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: Saga and Martin hunt down a group of eco-terrorists in season two of the acclaimed crime thriller. BAFTA-nominated Scandinavian crime thriller. Foreign language with English subtitles.

includedIn.title: The Bridge
includedIn.synopsis: When a body is found lying across the Danish/Swedish border, two detectives - one from each nation - are forced to work together to solve the case.
